tool_description: Find Proof of Delivery from the image - TESTING
title: POD finder

api_list.name: get_POD
api_list.description: POST request to get POD from Image URL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pod-finder1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pod-finder1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Request_Details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pod-finder1.p.rapidapi.com/req_details/{req_id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pod-finder1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
